Body: Thank you for the positive comment we appreciate it.  A lot of users have been asking why our ico will only sell 10,000,000 KRC tokens. The reason behind this is if you go and run a bigger ico and acquire a huge some of cash you would have to get the equipment, rental space, power allocation and more employees, thus making your profit margin too small because your overheads. Some ico's have over 20 people, and that's without maintenance staff.  Suppliers will only sell a certain amount of equipment, you can only go as big as what power to the building allows, more equipment more maintenance leading to more overall costs.  The focus here is profit, making the coin have value, Lower overheads better profits.

Author: Kerberos Coin
Title: [ANN]ðŸš€[ICO]Kerberos-ALTCOIN Only Mining-The Coin That Grows With The CompanyðŸ”¥
Body: Hi  Thanks for your questions  1) The purpose of our hard cap is to keep the project at a certain size, going bigger will implement more overhead cost like staff premises and electricity. 2) Soft cap is set to have a minimum target to start the procurement process of premises and hardware. 3) If you run a mining operation for $500K or $10 Million the amount of the payouts will be similar (Larger project, bigger overheads), the reason is that you only sold a certain amount of KRC coins and the rest gets burned.

Author: Kerberos Coin
Title: [ANN]ðŸš€[ICO]Kerberos-ALTCOIN Only Mining-The Coin That Grows With The CompanyðŸ”¥
Body: What is Kerberos Mining?  The Kerberos Coin is a startup GPU Only Crypto mining company based in Gauteng South Africa. The South African Landscape for Crypto Farming is still in a very early stage of adoption and development. Demand for mining operations worldwide will increase exponentially over the next few years to ensure the long term stability of Cryptocurrency and Blockchain applications. South Africa is a flourishing country with world class commercial infrastructure and relatively inexpensive electricity supply, which makes it a very suitable environment for the Kerberos Coin Project.  KRC Information  Coin name is Kerberos â€“ Abbreviation: KRC ICO start date is the 1st of April 2018 12:00 AM GMT and runs until 12:00AM GMT the 1st May 2018. The Coin offering will be open to the global public. Restrictions apply for residents of Germany and US-based investors. Kerberos Coin is based on the ERC20 protocol, which determines that up to 10 million coins will be issued with the first round discount of 34% (US$0.12). The final coin allocation is set up as follows:  88% Investors  5% Founders  4% Kerberos Company  3% Bounty Program   Token Discount and Sales  o   First round of 2,900 000 million tokens will be sold at 34% discount (US$0.12) o   Second round of 2,900 000 million tokens at 15% discount (US$0.14) o   The last 3,000 000 million tokens will sell at its original price of US$ 0.16   Kerberos is not a minable Coin. Dividends to be paid out in Ethereum quarterly to secure wallet.  Funding Goals  The soft cap funding goal is US$ 500,000 with a hard cap of US$ 1.2 million.  Invested funds will be allocated as follows: Ninety percent (90%) of funds for acquisition of hardware and initiation and completion of operational infrastructure. Five percent (5%) Infrastructure and Marketing Five percent (5%) Research and development. In the event that soft cap is not reached at closing of ICO, the investors will be contacted with a proposal to continue operation at a profitable scale.   The premises preparation will only commence once an ETA on hardware delivery has been confirmed. Estimated return on investment (ROI) is projected to be between 7â€“10 months, depending on current difficulty and profitability of the Crypto environment at any given time.  Dividend Payouts  The proposal is that all profits after deductions will be divided as follows: Each coin will entitle its holder to their pro-rata share of 70% of the companyâ€™s profits after deductions every quarter for the duration of the project. The other 30% is then reinvested into additional mining equipment and the development and improvement of Kerberos Company. The amount of dividends is a pro-rata share of the tokens held by our investors at the time of dividend declaration. The dividends are calculated and paid out quarterly in Ethereum.  Kerberos Details  Telegram: https://t.me/Kerberoscoin YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GLWtRwvVUyQ&t=2s Website: Www.KerberosCoin.Org Twitter: https://twitter.com/KerberosCoin Github: https://github.com/KerberosCoin/Kerberos-Coin/blob/master/KRC%20Code   Kerberos Project RoadMap    KRC Team     https://www.linkedin.com/in/chrysos-daneel/ https://www.linkedin.com/in/stefanus-botha-270209157/ https://www.facebook.com/stacey.ferreira https://www.linkedin.com/in/herman-venter-9243a3a4/

Author: Aris_Eng
